articles.title: 10 ways to assist older individuals with mental health challenges - The Times of India
articles.description: ​Assisting older individuals with mental health challenges several factors. These actions collectively enhance their well-being and mental health. Let's look at how one can assist these individuals to lead a productive life.
articles.content: A balanced diet rich in nutrients can positively impact mental health. Include plenty of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins in their meals.
